thmuggleton.model.impl

Class FrameImplTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • thmuggleton.model.impl.FrameImplTest

  • public class FrameImplTest
extends Object
    Tests for the Frame model class.

    Adopts BDD naming conventions suggested by Dan North.

    Takes a 'classical' TDD approach to focus on results rather than behavioural expectations so that test code is less coupled to the implementation. (See Mocks Aren't Stubs).

    Author:
    Thomas Muggleton

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      org.junit.rules.ExpectedException exception 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      FrameImplTest() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void shouldReturnCorrectTotalForSpareFrame()
      Tests that a frame returns the correct total when a spare is scored.
      void shouldReturnCorrectTotalForStandardFrame()
      Tests that the frame object returns the correct total for a frame that did involve a strike or a spare.
      void shouldReturnCorrectTotalForStrikeFrame()
      Tests that frame object returns correct total for a frame when a strike was scored.
      void shouldThrowExceptionForBonusPointsOnNonFullScoringFrame()
      Tests that an exception will be thrown if bonus points are set for a frame in which a strike or a spare was not scored.
      void shouldThrowExceptionForSecondBallOnStrikeFrame()
      Tests that an exception will be thrown for second ball score set for a frame in which a strike was scored.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
